data.name: Nightmare Rooms VR
data.detailed_description:
Warning: This game is designed to make you feel uncomfortable, scare you, question your wits, and test your emotional courage. It is not for the faint of heart!

How did you end up here exactly? There's something familiar about this whole place, as if you've been here in your dreams... or nightmares!

Escaping won't be so easy. Beyond the 2million square feet of unique labyrinth, you'll still find yourself wondering on forever boundlessly. Don't lose your sanity though when you stumble into an infinitely looping space or you may need to skip the morning coffee in anticipation for some abrupt surprises.

There are so many empty rooms... You must be the only one down here, right?

Nightmare Rooms VR is primarily an infinite horror labyrinth, where you will be navigating a maze while evading perils & scares. A stamina system will limit your rate of teleportation to emulate fatigue while you find consumables & other items to help you along the way. Which way exactly? That's part of the puzzle.

Completion of the game unlocks additional game modes & secrets to find to add to re-playability. Functional features include auto saving of progress with cloud backup, as well as an innovative new mechanic to prevent you from teleporting through walls.

You will spend the majority of time exploring this nightmare (teleporting), so completion requires tremendous patience & courage!

Do you have what it takes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: May experience sudden distressing sounds, visual surprises (jump scares), dangerous feeling environments, disturbing creatures/entities, & feelings of falling, claustrophobia, or dread.
